greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of Laguerre(n, -1).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..440
formula: a(n) = numerator(s(n)), where s(0)=1/2, s(n) = 1/(n+2)*(n +1 + Sum_{i=0..n-2} s(n-i-2)*(i+1)). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Sep 30 2016
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = {x = 'x + O('x^nn); v = exp(x/(1-x))/(1-x); for (n=0, nn-1, print1(numerator(polcoeff(v, n)), ", "););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 27 2015
(PARI) for(n=0,30, print1(numerator(sum(k=0,n, binomial(n,k)*(1/k!))), ", ")) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, May 06 2018
(MAGMA) [Numerator((&+[Binomial(n,k)*(1/Factorial(k)): k in [0..n]])): n in [0..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, May 06 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 14 2009
